attacks.name: Aqua Turbo
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Water Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Pearl Hurricane
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
